Highlights Budapest’s Christmas Charm Explore both Buda and Pest adorned in festive lights, with seasonal treats and outdoor ice skating adding to the magic. Vienna’s Iconic Christmas Markets Stroll through world-famous markets surrounded by imperial architecture and the sounds of classical music. Scenic Sailing through the Wachau Valley Cruise past UNESCO-listed landscapes dotted with hillside vineyards, quaint villages, and historic castles. Göttweig Abbey in Krems Visit this stunning baroque abbey with its magnificent frescoes and panoramic views over the Danube. Regensburg’s Medieval Holiday Atmosphere Discover one of Germany’s best-preserved medieval towns, where charming Christmas markets line cobbled streets. With its state-of-the-art design, Scandinavian elegance, and spacious public areas, your ship is more than just a vessel—it’s your floating boutique hotel. Each Longship features a serene, understated aesthetic that reflects Viking’s commitment to comfort, functionality, and timeless design. Floor-to-ceiling windows in the lounge and restaurant offer panoramic views of the ever-changing scenery, while the open-air Aquavit Terrace provides a relaxed setting for al fresco dining or sunset cocktails along the riverbanks. Accommodations include a variety of stateroom categories, all with river views—many with full-size verandas or French balconies. Dining on board is a culinary journey of its own, with menus inspired by regional cuisine and international favorites. Enjoy complimentary wine and beer with lunch and dinner, as well as daily cultural enrichment programs, port talks, and live music in the lounge. With no casinos, no children under 18, and no unnecessary distractions, Viking offers a serene, immersive, and destination-focused experience. Whether you’re gliding past the castles of the Rhine, the vineyards of the Wachau, or the bustling quays of Budapest, your Longship ensures every moment on board is as memorable as your time ashore.
